TEXT.S:
Smangus i Hsinchu a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Smangus. u kasalumaluma' nu Smangus sa, 38 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 176 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 173 ku tademaw, pakalatu 98%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 3 ku tademaw, pakalatu 2%. u kasabinacadan, Tayal 85%, Amis 1%, Paiwan 2%, Bunun 1%, zumazuma 10%.
Smangus i Hsinchu a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Smangus. u kasalumaluma' nu Smangus sa, 48 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 233 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 223 ku tademaw, pakalatu 96%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 10 ku tademaw, pakalatu 4%. u kasabinacadan, Tayal 91%, SaySiyat 1%, zumazuma 3%.
